headline: New Technique Makes Old Vaccine for Tuberculosis Far More Effective
abstract: Giving the vaccine intravenously to monkeys provided 90% protection against tuberculosis. More testing is needed before humans can be inoculated that way.
lead_paragraph: In the constant search for a vaccine against tuberculosis — which now kills more people around the world than any other infectious disease — researchers have made an unusual discovery.
keywords: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
